ai-atk-s0302a9:38_0: Even the Teacher, once again emerged from the great sacrifice, looking at the front of them, and once more than sixteenth day of the Bhikkhunīs, sat down near the golden shade of the Yellow sandalwood, and giving them full admission to the great garden, thinking: “The Sambuddha, after seeing the vicinity of the world, and giving them a great sacrifice,” and seeing the request of his body, he sat down on the road for alms.

ai-atk-s0302a9:38_2: The Kings, after worshipping the Teacher, sat down on one side.

ai-atk-s0302a9:38_4: At the conclusion of the teaching on the Teacher, they all asked for the going forth.
